description.value: Character counts as having the Deadly Natural Weapons Trait applied to their unarmed capabilities. Deadly Natural Weapons: Natural weapons no longer have Primitive(7), doing a flat 1d10+Strength Bonus Damage.

system.benefit: Character counts as having the Deadly Natural Weapons Trait applied to their unarmed capabilities. Deadly Natural Weapons: Natural weapons no longer have Primitive(7), doing a flat 1d10+Strength Bonus Damage.
